item.title: my first post with a new CMS
item.author: cheret.en
item.description: after more than a decadeJust so you know, I’ve been a WordPress user, admin, and plugin author for more than a decade now. I could’ve set this up as yet another one of those ubiquitous WordPress pages. This time, however, I’m taking a different approach. HUGO is my tool of choice as I’m a DevSecOps Advisor, leaning into Infrastructure as Code (IaC) and of course the automation behind this declarative setup.
